thread.title: You Won't Believe This Circus Lion's Reaction the First Time He Touches Grass
thread.title_full: You Won't Believe This Circus Lion's Reaction the First Time He Touches Grass

author: Hedy Phillips
title: You Won't Believe This Circus Lion's Reaction the First Time He Touches Grass
text:
Circus Lion Touches Grass For the First Time | Video You Won't Believe This Circus Lion's Reaction the First Time He Touches Grass January 17, 2017 by Hedy Phillips 721 Shares 
As amazing as something like the circus is, many circus animals are unfortunately held in captivity for years and maybe even their whole lives. The lion in this video is a former circus animal held captive for 13 years. When he is finally released back out into the great outdoors, his reaction is simply priceless. With the recent news of Ringling Bros. circus closing down for good , this video is even more special. Watch above to see, and then check out even more amazingly cute animal videos .
